mapper.insert: insert into doginfo(userid, dogname, speciesId, size, age, gender, picture, detail) values(#{userid}, #{dogname}, #{speciesId}, #{size}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{picture}, #{detail})
mapper.update: update doginfo set userid = #{userid}, dogname = #{dogname}, speciesId = #{speciesId}, size = #{size}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, picture = #{picture}, detail = #{detail} where id = #{id}
